Nothing irritates me as much as getting piles of junk mail through the post. (MORE)

tag: U7 p76 5 Relative clauses – Open writing
questionText: Describe a popular place in your country and why people go there. Use the phrases below.

Complete the second sentence so that it has a similar meaning to the first sentence, using the word given. Do not change the word given. You must use between two and five words, including the word given.
It was too foggy for us to ski.
He couldn't afford a taxi, so he went by bus.
There was so much traffic that we missed the show.
I had a wonderful time and I really enjoyed seeing everyone again.
He said I didn't need to make an appointment.
I think that taking your coat is unnecessary.
You will get the results by Friday. GIVEN
A fast-food chain has taken over two of our local restaurants. BY
Nearly all the shops in this town are expensive. HARDLY
Many people believe that too much sugar is bad for your health. TO
George hadn't finished doing his homework when I went to pick him up. STILL
My brother often arrives unexpectedly. TURNING
